aircraft.value: Vulture Heavy - AC-5613-495 at Regional Depot-C

defect_observed.value: Starter generator malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Improper calibration during last maintenance cycle

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Turbine Assembly component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Clean and re-lubricate affected assemblies per technical manual

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings. Date: 08/02/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 09/02/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 10/02/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 14/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 16/02/2023 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh
